title: Top Floor! Bright! Spacious! Ready for Summer? We got Central AC! W/D!
posting_body: ['Aperture Apartments in San Bruno', '1 Bedroom 1 Bath', 'Spacious 1bedroom/month starting at $3133', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'or contact us online', 'ONE FREE Parking Space, Controlled Garage!', '104 is an amazing ground-floor unit.', ' Open floor plan with a large private patio.', ' Our ground floor units have 12 feet high ceilings!', 'Working from home, hybrid?', ' We are fiber-ready with our internet providers offering speeds of up to 1G!', 'At Aperture, everything is already in place including a vibrant amenity experience and contemporary apartment residences.', 'Our brand new apartments feature:', 'Stainless steel Energy Star appliances', 'Upgraded Refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, and glass top range', 'In-home, Full stacked washer and dryer', 'Solid surface quartz countertops throughout', 'Full height tile backsplash in kitchen', 'High-efficiency central heat and air conditioning', 'Slick window coverings (or similar)', 'Hardwood-style plank flooring throughout living areas', 'Walk-in closets and ample storage space', 'Downtown location, adjacent to transit, shopping, services including BART, CalTrain & the shops at Tanforan', 'Interactive and multifunctional leasing lounge', 'State-of-the-art fitness center', 'Connected community – fiber internet ready', 'Modern clubroom with a full kitchen', 'Private courtyard with outdoor kitchen BBQs, fireplaces, and dining areas', 'Digital package lockers with immediate notification', 'Controlled access to community and parking garage', 'Electric vehicle charging stations', 'Bike storage', 'On-site storage units', 'For questions about Aperture, or to request a private showing, please call us at', 'show contact info', 'or contact us online and discover your new home at Aperture today.', 'Open Monday - Friday 8-5, call or email to schedule an appointment!', 'Aperture', '400 San Mateo Avenue', 'San Bruno, CA 94066', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
